name: iREC
description: A narcotics police officer invades a logistics company, suspected of drug trafficking. Looking for evidence, he discovers an even greater secret, and his mission now and leave the place alive. iREC presents moments of tension, with an incredible atmosphere of terror.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 - 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB DirectX: Version 11
